title: These Are The Times That Try Investors’ Souls
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: What the American revolutionary Thomas Paine wrote about a military and political crisis applies as well to a financial one. Specifically, he wrote that panics are “short” and “advantageous.” If you’ve properly prepared, you can emerge from this interval stronger than you entered it, as Colonial America emerged from its battle with Britain. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
